title: dateAdd
name: dateAdd
description:
Adds units of time to a date.
        [datepart - quicky]
        yyyy: Year; q: Quarter; m: Month; y: Day of year; d: Day
        w: Weekday; ww: Week; h: Hour; n: Minute; s: Second;
        l: Millisecond

arguments.name: datepart
arguments.description:
one of the following:
- yyyy: Year
- q: Quarter
- m: Month
- y: Day of year
- d: Day
- w: Weekday
- ww: Week
- h: Hour
- n: Minute
- s: Second
- l: Millisecond

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: Number of units of datepart to add to date (positive, to get dates in the future; negative, to get dates in the past). Number must be an integer.
